pr_title: Add Azure Service Fabric MI Support.

timeline.message: add service fabric MI auth logic

timeline.bodyText:
Small fix:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * The Managed Service Identity credential for Azure App Service.
          
          
            
             * The Managed Service Identity credential for Azure Service Fabric.
timeline.author: mccoyp

timeline.bodyText: Similar to the comments in PR #13466, throw the exception here.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Can this be converted into an enum where all the environments are listed?
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText:
Yeah since this is not public API, internally it can be introduced as an impl detaiI.
But, not critically needed currently, as this info is used only in the log message currently.
I'll introduce it in a follow up code refactor PR.
replies.author: g2vinay

timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Since this is a static helper class, make the ctor private to avoid instantiation.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: This can be converted to a static logger.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: We have a checkstyle rule to not have static loggers.
replies.author: g2vinay

replies.bodyText: For static helper classes, it's okay to use static logger and add checkstyle suppression.
replies.author: srnagar
